_header: That maiden mild her child did keep
Subjects: dialogues, Virgin and Christ; carols, lullaby
_description: James Ryman, Dialogue between the Virgin Mary and her Child — fourteen quatrains (abab) each ending with the word ‘alone’ and burden: ‘Mary hath borne alone / The sonne of god in trone’

CULEe112.First Lines:
That meyden mylde here childe did kepeAs moders dothe
                    echone…
CULEe112.Last Lines:
…I wyll aryse by my grete myghtAnd confort the
                    Alone
